creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: multicolored geometric stripes; motifs: diamonds and triangles, fruit, flowers and birds at shoulder; applique ribbon (commercial) around arms and neck opening; red section at lower edge has pattern on one side only; lower edge, other side fringed
dimension: 37 1/2 x 23 in. (95.25 x 58.42 cm) (at shoulder, without fringe)
title: Huipil
